Korea bụ mpaghara ala dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia
Kemgbe 1945, e kewara ya n'etiti mba abụọ, na ma ọ bụ n'akụkụ nke iri atọ na asatọ, North Korea ( Democratic People's Republic of Korea) na South Korea ( Republic of Korea)
Korea nwere Peninsula Korea, Jeju Island, na ọtụtụ obere agwaetiti dị nso na peninsula
Ókèala ala ahụ bụ China n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ yana Russia n'akụkụ ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ọ bụ Korea Strait na Oké Osimiri Japan (Osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ) kewapụrụ ya na Japan n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ.￼
